Package space.sunqian.fs.base.thread

Class LocalKit

java.lang.Object
space.sunqian.fs.base.thread.LocalKit
public class LocalKit extends Object
Utilities for thread-local. This class supports get and/or set values in the local thread by get(Object), get(Object, Function) and set(Object, Object).

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static <K, V> V get(@Nonnull K key)
      Returns the value to which the specified key is mapped int the local thread. or null if the local thread contains no mapping for the key.
      Type Parameters:
      K - the key type
      V - the value type
      Parameters:
      key - the specified key
      Returns:
      the value to which the specified key is mapped int the local thread, or null if the local thread contains no mapping for the key

    • get

      public static <K, V> V get(@Nonnull K key, @Nonnull @Nonnull Function<? super @Nonnull K,? extends V> func)
      Returns the value to which the specified key is mapped int the local thread. If the specified key is not already associated with a value (or is mapped to null), attempts to compute its value using the given mapping function and enters it into this map unless null. If the function returns null no mapping is recorded. The behavior of this method is equivalent to: asMap().computeIfAbsent(key, func).
      Type Parameters:
      K - the key type
      V - the value type
      Parameters:
      key - the specified key
      func - the given mapping function
      Returns:
      the value to which the specified key is mapped int the local thread, or a new value computed by the given mapping function if the local thread contains no mapping for the key
      See Also:
      • Map.computeIfAbsent(Object, Function)

    • set

      public static <K, V> V set(@Nonnull K key, V value)
      Sets the specified value with the specified key int the local thread. If a mapping already exists for the key, the old value is replaced by the specified value and the old value will be returned.
      Type Parameters:
      K - the key type
      V - the value type
      Parameters:
      key - the specified key
      value - the specified value
      Returns:
      the old value or null if no old mapping

    • remove

      public static <K, V> V remove(@Nonnull K key)
      Removes the mapping for the specified key from this local thread if present, returns the old value or null if no old mapping.
      Type Parameters:
      K - the key type
      V - the value type
      Parameters:
      key - the specified key
      Returns:
      the old value or null if no old mapping

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Removes all entries from the local thread.

    • contextMap

      @Nonnull public static @Nonnull Map<Object,Object> contextMap()
      Returns all entries in the local thread as a Map. The returned Map is mutable, any changes to the Map will reflect to the entries of the local thread.
      Returns:
      all entries in the local thread as a Map
